name: Small Tarpaulin
description: Small tarpaulin for covering exposed areas and protecting belongings from rain.

name: Heavy-Duty Tarpaulin
description: Reinforced tarpaulin for temporary coverage of damaged classrooms and walkways.

name: Fuel Containers
description: Certified fuel cans for transporting gasoline or butane during response.

name: Exterior Door - 36x80
description: Standard 36x80 exterior door for securing repaired classrooms and offices.

name: Metal Door - 36x80
description: Metal door with raised panel design, 36x80 inches.

name: Plywood Door - 32x80
description: Plywood door, 32x80 inches.

name: Deadbolt Lock - Single Key
description: Deadbolt lock with single key operation.

name: Entrance Lock - Single Turn
description: Entrance door lock with single turn mechanism.

name: Circuit Breaker - 20Amp Double Pole
description: 20 amp double pole circuit breaker for electrical distribution.

name: LED Emergency Bulb - 11W
description: LED emergency light bulb with intelligent features, 11 watts.

name: Electrical Tape - Multi Color
description: Electrical tape in multiple colors (yellow, blue, red, green) for wire identification and insulation.

name: Barb Wire Roll
description: Galvanized barb wire in rolls for fence construction and repair. Used to secure pasture boundaries and protect livestock areas.

name: Chainsaw Fuel (Mixed Gas)
description: Pre-mixed fuel for chainsaw operation. Required for clearing fallen trees and debris.

name: Bagged Concrete Mix
description: Ready-mix concrete in 94 lb bags for post footings and slab patching.

name: Chainsaw Bar & Chain Oil
description: High-tack lubricant that keeps chainsaws running during continuous biomass removal.

name: Heavy-Duty Wheelbarrow
description: Reinforced wheelbarrow for hauling debris, posts, and feed across the farm.

name: Fence Wire Tensioning Kit
description: Come-along and stretcher set for tightening long runs of barbed wire.

name: Post Hole Tool Kit
description: Digging bar, manual auger, and post-hole shovel for installing boundary posts.

name: Cow Shed Stall Hardware Kit
description: Boards, trough brackets, and fasteners required to rebuild dairy stall fronts.

name: Fence Crew PPE Kit
description: Gloves, boots, and safety glasses to protect crews while handling barbed wire.

name: Roof Work PPE Kit
description: Set of helmets, gloves, harnesses, and boots for safe roof demolition and install.

name: Rope & Bungee Securing Kit
description: Coiled rope, tie-down straps, and bungee cords used to cinch tarps to surviving rafters.

name: Heavy-Duty Garbage Bag Pack
description: Contractor-grade refuse bags that double as moisture liners and debris control.

name: Large Garbage Bags Roll
description: Roll of large garbage bags for temporary leak protection, debris control, and waste segregation.

name: Kerosene
description: Kerosene for lighting lamps and cooking during power outages.

name: Portable Generator - 5kW
description: Gasoline/diesel portable generator sized for farm pumps, refrigeration, and communications gear.

name: Heavy-Duty Extension Cables
description: Outdoor-rated 50–100 ft extension cables that bridge generators to the farmhouse safely.

name: Generator Fuel Reserve
description: Stored gasoline/diesel supply with stabilizer for multi-day generator operation.

name: Surge-Protected Power Strips
description: Multi-outlet strips with surge protection for distributing limited generator power.

name: LED Work Lights
description: Adjustable LED flood/work lights for night stabilization and milking tasks.

name: Battery Lanterns
description: Long-run LED lanterns that keep bedrooms and work areas lit during outages.

name: Water Storage Containers
description: Food-grade storage drums for capturing potable water while plumbing is offline.

name: Mosquito Coils & Repellent Kit
description: Bulk coils and repellents that push back mosquitos around sleeping and livestock areas.

name: Comprehensive First Aid Supplies
description: Dressings, antiseptics, and trauma supplies for a farm family sheltering in place.

name: Sanitation Supply Kit
description: Bleach, disinfectant, soaps, and gloves to keep the household hygienic after flooding.

name: Dry Bedding & Blanket Pack
description: Moisture-resistant blankets and bedding used when original linens are soaked.

name: Battery Charger & Power Bank Pack
description: USB battery banks and multi-port chargers to keep phones and radios alive.

name: Headlamp & Flashlight Set
description: Rechargeable headlamps and handheld flashlights for moving across the farm at night.

name: Rain Boots
description: High-shaft waterproof boots that keep crews dry while crossing flooded paddocks.

name: Rain Jackets
description: Waterproof outer shells with hoods so family members can keep working in rain bands.
